briefdescription.para: Use the last worldstate received by the server as the one being read.
Take the contents of the read-only worldstate last received by the server from a player and move its contents to the stored worldstate that can be sent by the server.
Clear the map changes for the write-only worldstate.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to initialize the sending of new WorldMap packets.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of indexes in the read worldstate's map changes.
Get the weather region in the read worldstate.
Get the current weather in the read worldstate.
Get the next weather in the read worldstate.
Get the queued weather in the read worldstate.
Get the transition factor of the weather in the read worldstate.

simplesect.para: The transition factor of the weather.

briefdescription.para: Get the X coordinate of the cell corresponding to the map tile at a certain index in the read worldstate's map tiles.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the map tile.

simplesect.para: The X coordinate of the cell.

briefdescription.para: Get the Y coordinate of the cell corresponding to the map tile at a certain index in the read worldstate's map tiles.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the map tile.

simplesect.para: The Y coordinate of the cell.

briefdescription.para: Set the region affected by the next WorldRegionAuthority packet sent.

parameterdescription.para: The region.

briefdescription.para: Set the weather region in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The region.

briefdescription.para: Set the weather forcing state in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Players who receive a packet with forced weather will switch to that weather immediately.

parameterdescription.para: The weather forcing state.

briefdescription.para: Set the current weather in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The current weather.

briefdescription.para: Set the next weather in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The next weather.

briefdescription.para: Set the queued weather in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The queued weather.

briefdescription.para: Set the transition factor for the weather in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The transition factor.

briefdescription.para: Set the world's hour in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The hour.

briefdescription.para: Set the world's day in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The day.

briefdescription.para: Set the world's month in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The month.

briefdescription.para: Set the world's year in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The year.

briefdescription.para: Set the world's days passed in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The days passed.

briefdescription.para: Set the world's time scale in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The time scale.

briefdescription.para: Set the collision state for other players in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The collision state.

briefdescription.para: Set the collision state for actors in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The collision state.

briefdescription.para: Set the collision state for placed objects in the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The collision state.

briefdescription.para: Whether placed objects with collision turned on should use actor collision, i.e. whether they should be slippery and prevent players from standing on them.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to use actor collision.

briefdescription.para: Add a refId to the list of refIds for which collision should be enforced irrespective of other settings.

parameterdescription.para: The refId.

briefdescription.para: Clear the list of refIdsd for which collision should be enforced irrespective of other settings.
Save the .png image data of the map tile at a certain index in the read worldstate's map changes.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the map tile.
The file path of the resulting file.

memberdef.argsstring: (int cellX, int cellY, const char *filePath) noexcept
memberdef.name: LoadMapTileImageFile

briefdescription.para: Load a .png file as the image data for a map tile and add it to the write-only worldstate stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The X coordinate of the cell corresponding to the map tile.
The Y coordinate of the cell corresponding to the map tile.
The file path of the loaded file.

briefdescription.para: Send a WorldRegionAuthority packet establishing a certain player as the only one who should process certain region-specific events (such as weather changes).

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID attached to the packet.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, bool sendToOtherPlayers, bool skipAttachedPlayer) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendWorldMap

briefdescription.para: Send a WorldMap packet with the current set of map changes in the write-only worldstate.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID attached to the packet.
Whether this packet should be sent only to the attached player or to all players on the server.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, bool sendToOtherPlayers, bool skipAttachedPlayer) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendWorldTime

briefdescription.para: Send a WorldTime packet with the current time and time scale in the write-only worldstate.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID attached to the packet.
Whether this packet should be sent to players other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, bool sendToOtherPlayers, bool skipAttachedPlayer) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendWorldWeather

briefdescription.para: Send a WorldWeather packet with the current weather in the write-only worldstate.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID attached to the packet.
Whether this packet should be sent to players other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, bool sendToOtherPlayers, bool skipAttachedPlayer) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendWorldCollisionOverride

briefdescription.para: Send a WorldCollisionOverride packet with the current collision overrides in the write-only worldstate.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID attached to the packet.
Whether this packet should be sent to players other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).
